# FLlearnr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The `FLlearnr` provides additional and customised logic useful for learnr and
    learnrhash documents.

## Installation

You can install `FLlearnr` with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("finnlindgren/FLlearnr")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(FLlearnr)
## basic example code
```
